article.title: Harris Corporation Awarded $60 Million Continuation Contract for Air Force Satellite Control Network Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation has been awarded a $60 million contract by the U.S. Air Force to continue work under the first-year option for the Network and Space Operations and Maintenance (NSOM) program. The contract's potential overall value is $405 million over six and a half years.
